entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Periods of snow beginning late in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
